lead_paragraph: KRASNER--Joanna, 85, on December 24, 2015. Born March 13, 1930. Professor, brilliant artist and extraordinary mother to Jenny Krasner, artist, and wife of the late Oscar Krasner, Director, The Krasner Gallery. 1/3
